modules.description: Encodes and decodes byte sequences to and from hexadecimal strings using direct conversion functions. Works with byte arrays and strings, handling both uppercase and lowercase representations. Converts binary data for network transmission or file storage formats requiring hex encoding.

Encodes byte sequences into hexadecimal strings and decodes hexadecimal strings back into byte sequences, handling invalid input with error reporting. Works with OCaml's bytes type and string type. Useful for converting binary data for network transmission or file storage and validating hex-encoded inputs.
